1.1.name: wordpress/custom-404-error-page-unlimited-designs-colors-and-fonts
1.1.description:
Custom 404, helps you customize your 404. From the dashboard options you're able to modify the background, the image and the fonts color and style.

This page will show users the last post on your site, so that they may choose to follow one of this instead of leaving your page.
